member.name: T:System.Threading.Channels.BoundedChannelFullMode

summary.vsli:raw: Specifies the behavior to use when writing to a bounded channel that is already full.

member.summary: 指定寫入至已滿的繫結通道時要使用的行為。

member.name: F:System.Threading.Channels.BoundedChannelFullMode.DropNewest

summary.vsli:raw: Removes and ignores the newest item in the channel in order to make room for the item being written.

member.summary: 移除並忽略通道中最新的項目，以騰出空間給要寫入的項目。

member.name: F:System.Threading.Channels.BoundedChannelFullMode.DropOldest

summary.vsli:raw: Removes and ignores the oldest item in the channel in order to make room for the item being written.

member.summary: 移除並忽略通道中最舊的項目，以騰出空間給要寫入的項目。

member.name: F:System.Threading.Channels.BoundedChannelFullMode.DropWrite

summary.vsli:raw: Drops the item being written.

member.summary: 捨棄正在寫入的項目。

member.name: F:System.Threading.Channels.BoundedChannelFullMode.Wait

summary.vsli:raw: Waits for space to be available in order to complete the write operation.

member.summary: 等候空間變為可用以完成寫入作業。

member.name: T:System.Threading.Channels.BoundedChannelOptions

summary.vsli:raw: Provides options that control the behavior of bounded <see cref="T:System.Threading.Channels.Channel`1" /> instances.

member.summary: 提供選項，以控制繫結 執行個體的行為。

member.name: M:System.Threading.Channels.BoundedChannelOptions.#ctor(System.Int32)

summary.vsli:raw: Initializes the options.

member.summary: 將選項始化。

param.name: capacity
param.vsli:raw: The maximum number of items the bounded channel may store.

member.param: 繫結之通道可能儲存的項目數上限。

member.name: P:System.Threading.Channels.BoundedChannelOptions.Capacity

summary.vsli:raw: Gets or sets the maximum number of items the bounded channel may store.

member.summary: 取得或設定繫結之通道可能儲存的項目數上限。

member.name: P:System.Threading.Channels.BoundedChannelOptions.FullMode

summary.vsli:raw: Gets or sets the behavior incurred by write operations when the channel is full.

member.summary: 取得或設定通道已滿時，寫入作業所產生的行為。

member.name: T:System.Threading.Channels.ChannelOptions

summary.vsli:raw: Provides options that control the behavior of channel instances.

member.summary: 提供控制通道執行個體行為的選項。

member.name: P:System.Threading.Channels.ChannelOptions.AllowSynchronousContinuations

summary.vsli:raw: <see langword="true" /> if operations performed on a channel may synchronously invoke continuations subscribed to notifications of pending async operations; <see langword="false" /> if all continuations should be invoked asynchronously.

member.summary: 如果在通道上執行的作業可能以同步方式叫用暫止之非同步作業通知的接續訂閱，則為 ，若所有的接續都應以非同步方式叫用，則為 。

member.name: P:System.Threading.Channels.ChannelOptions.SingleReader

summary.vsli:raw: <see langword="true" /> readers from the channel guarantee that there will only ever be at most one read operation at a time; <see langword="false" /> if no such constraint is guaranteed.

member.summary: 通道的讀取器保證一次最多只會有一個讀取作業時則為 ，若沒有這類條件約束則為 。

member.name: P:System.Threading.Channels.ChannelOptions.SingleWriter

summary.vsli:raw: <see langword="true" /> if writers to the channel guarantee that there will only ever be at most one write operation at a time; <see langword="false" /> if no such constraint is guaranteed.

member.summary: 通道的讀取器保證一次最多只會有一個讀取作業時則為 ，若沒有保證這類條件約束，則為 。

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.vsli:raw: Specifies the type of data that may be read from the channel.

member.typeparam: 指定可從通道讀取的資料類型。

member.name: P:System.Threading.Channels.ChannelReader`1.Completion

summary.vsli:raw: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> that completes when no more data will ever be available to be read from this channel.

member.summary: 取得於此通道中沒有更多資料可供讀取時完成的 。

member.name: M:System.Threading.Channels.ChannelReader`1.ReadAllAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)

summary.vsli:raw: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IAsyncEnumerable`1" /> that enables reading all of the data from the channel.

member.summary: 建立可讓您讀取通道中所有資料的 。

param.name: cancellationToken
param.vsli:raw: The cancellation token to use to cancel the enumeration. If data is immediately ready for reading, then that data may be yielded even after cancellation has been requested.

member.param: 用於取消列舉的取消語彙基元。

member.name: M:System.Threading.Channels.ChannelReader`1.ReadAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)

summary.vsli:raw: Asynchronously reads an item from the channel.

member.summary: 以非同步方式從通道讀取項目。

param.name: cancellationToken
param.vsli:raw: A <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" /> used to cancel the read operation.

returns.vsli:raw: A <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.ValueTask`1" /> that represents the asynchronous read operation.

member.returns: 表示非同步讀取作業的 。

member.name: M:System.Threading.Channels.ChannelReader`1.TryRead(`0@)

summary.vsli:raw: Attempts to read an item from the channel.

member.summary: 嘗試從通道讀取項目。

param.name: item
param.vsli:raw: The read item, or a default value if no item could be read.

member.param: 讀取的項目，若沒有任何可讀取的項目則為預設值。

returns.vsli:raw: <see langword="true" /> if an item was read; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

member.returns: 若項目已讀取，則為 ，否則為 。

member.name: M:System.Threading.Channels.ChannelReader`1.WaitToReadAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)

summary.vsli:raw: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.ValueTask`1" /> that will complete when data is available to read.

member.summary: 傳回資料可供讀取時將完成的 。

param.name: cancellationToken
param.vsli:raw: A <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" /> used to cancel the wait operation.

returns.vsli:raw: <para>A <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.ValueTask`1" /> that will complete with a <see langword="true" /> result when data is available to read or with a <see langword="false" /> result when no further data will ever be available to be read due to the channel completing successfully.</para><para>If the channel completes with an exception, the task will also complete with an exception.</para>

member.returns: 資料可供讀取時 將會完成且含有 結果，若沒有進一步資料可供讀取時將含有 結果。

member.name: T:System.Threading.Channels.ChannelWriter`1

summary.vsli:raw: Provides a base class for writing to a channel.

member.summary: 提供用來寫入至通道的基底類別。

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.vsli:raw: Specifies the type of data that may be written to the channel.

member.typeparam: 指定可寫入通道的資料類型。

member.name: M:System.Threading.Channels.ChannelWriter`1.Complete(System.Exception)

summary.vsli:raw: Mark the channel as being complete, meaning no more items will be written to it.

member.summary: 將通道標示為完成，表示不會再有任何項目會寫入其中。

param.name: error
param.vsli:raw: Optional Exception indicating a failure that's causing the channel to complete.

member.param: 選擇性例外狀況指出造成管線完成的失敗。

exception.vsli:raw: The channel has already been marked as complete.

member.name: M:System.Threading.Channels.ChannelWriter`1.TryComplete(System.Exception)

summary.vsli:raw: Attempts to mark the channel as being completed, meaning no more data will be written to it.

member.summary: 嘗試將通道標示為完成，代表不會再有任何資料寫入其中。

param.name: error
param.vsli:raw: An <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> indicating the failure causing no more data to be written, or null for success.

member.param: 指出造成不會寫入更多資料的失敗，若成功則為 Null。

returns.vsli:raw: <see langword="true" /> if this operation successfully completes the channel; otherwise, <see langword="false" /> if the channel could not be marked for completion, for example due to having already been marked as such, or due to not supporting completion. .

member.returns: 若此作業成功完成通道，則為 ，否則，若通道無法標示為完成，則為 ，例如因為已經標示為完成，或因為不支援完成。

member.name: M:System.Threading.Channels.ChannelWriter`1.TryWrite(`0)

summary.vsli:raw: Attempts to write the specified item to the channel.

member.summary: 嘗試將指定項目寫入通道。

param.name: item
param.vsli:raw: The item to write.

returns.vsli:raw: <see langword="true" /> if the item was written; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

member.returns: 若項目已寫入則為 ，否則為 。

member.name: M:System.Threading.Channels.ChannelWriter`1.WaitToWriteAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)

summary.vsli:raw: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.ValueTask`1" /> that will complete when space is available to write an item.

member.summary: 傳回空間可供寫入項目時將會完成的 。

param.name: cancellationToken
param.vsli:raw: A <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" /> used to cancel the wait operation.

returns.vsli:raw: A <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.ValueTask`1" /> that will complete with a <see langword="true" /> result when space is available to write an item or with a <see langword="false" /> result when no further writing will be permitted.

member.returns: 空間可供寫入項目時將會完成的 ，且含有 結果，若不允許進一步寫入時將含有 結果。

member.name: M:System.Threading.Channels.ChannelWriter`1.WriteAsync(`0,System.Threading.CancellationToken)

summary.vsli:raw: Asynchronously writes an item to the channel.

member.summary: 以非同步方式將項目寫入至通道。

param.name: item
param.vsli:raw: The value to write to the channel.

param.name: cancellationToken
param.vsli:raw: A <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" /> used to cancel the write operation.

returns.vsli:raw: A <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.ValueTask" /> that represents the asynchronous write operation.

member.returns: 表示非同步寫入作業的 。
